bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What fragrance concept did Rolls-Royce launch for the Phantom?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Rolls-Royce Scent, an immersive fragrance concept designed by their in-house perfumer.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Which driver won the Intercontinental GT Challenge Drivers' Championship in 2025?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Kelvin van der Linde was crowned Drivers' Champion of the Intercontinental GT Challenge.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What special edition 8 Series did BMW unveil at Pebble Beach in 2025?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: The 2026 M850i Edition M Heritage, a limited-edition 8 Series with five historic paint finishes.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: How many units of the M850i Edition M Heritage will be produced?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Limited to just 500 units distributed to select markets worldwide.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Which car won the 24H Dubai in its racing debut in 2025?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: The new BMW M4 GT3 EVO won the 24H Dubai in its racing debut.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Who was appointed as General Manager of Corporate Sales for BMW Group UK in July 2025?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Andrew Jago was appointed as General Manager of Corporate Sales for BMW Group UK.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What was the attendance at the BMW Motorrad Days 2025 in Garmisch-Partenkirchen?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Over 40,000 visitors from around 50 nations attended the BMW Motorrad Days 2025.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What record did the BMW M2 CS set on the Nürburgring-Nordschleife in April 2025?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: The BMW M2 CS set a new record of 7:25.5 on the Nürburgring-Nordschleife.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: How much did BMW sales increase in Q3 2025 compared to the same period last year?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: BMW sales rose 24% in Q3 2025 versus the same time period last year.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What percentage of BMW vehicles sold in the U.S. through Q3 2025 were electrified?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Nearly 20% of BMW vehicles sold in the U.S. through Q3 2025 had either battery electric (BEV) or plug-in hybrid (PHEV) drivetrains.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What advertising slogan controversy did BMW face in 2010?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: BMW faced controversy when it seemed to abandon 'The Ultimate Driving Machine' tagline for 'Joy is BMW'.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: When was 'The Ultimate Driving Machine' tagline coined?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: The tagline 'The Ultimate Driving Machine' was coined by Martin Puris in 1975.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Which tennis player did BMW extend its partnership with in September 2025?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: BMW extended its partnership with Spanish tennis ace Carlos Alcaraz.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Which BMW plant is planning a hydrogen pipeline link?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: BMW Group Plant Leipzig is planning a hydrogen pipeline link, making it the first car plant in the world to receive hydrogen via a pipeline.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Who was the standout performer at the 36th BMW International Open in July 2025?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Davis Bryant (USA) was the standout performer with a 9-under-par round and a hole-in-one.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What concept did BMW Motorrad present at the Concorso d'Eleganza Villa d'Este?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: BMW Motorrad presented the 'BMW Motorrad Concept RR' as a preview of the next generation of BMW RR superbikes.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What was the torque figure demonstrated by the BMW Vision Driving Experience in Shanghai?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: The BMW Vision Driving Experience demonstrated up to 18,000 Nm of torque.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What organization did BMW Group Brazil partner with for youth education?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: BMW Group Brazil partnered with UNICEF under the 'BRIDGE. Educating young people for tomorrow, today' programme.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Where did René Rast and Marco Wittmann compete in the DTM in August 2025?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: René Rast and Marco Wittmann competed at the Sachsenring in the DTM.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Which MINI John Cooper Works models are now fully electric?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: The first-ever MINI John Cooper Works Electric and first-ever MINI John Cooper Works Aceman are fully electric.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What is the WLTP range of the new BMW iX xDrive60?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: The new BMW iX xDrive60 achieves a WLTP range of 701 kilometres (435 miles).

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Who won a BMW iX M70 for a hole-in-one at the BMW Championship?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Akshay Bhatia won a BMW iX M70 for a hole-in-one at the BMW Championship.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: How many consecutive victories did Valentino Rossi achieve at Misano?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Valentino Rossi achieved his third consecutive victory at Misano in 2025.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What was BMW Group's BEV sales growth in 2024?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: BMW Group achieved BEV sales growth of +13.5% in 2024.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: How many BMW Art Cars were displayed at The Aurora 2025 in Sweden?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Four BMW Art Cars were displayed at The Aurora 2025 in Sweden.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What was the title of BMW Customer Service's 2025 campaign short film?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: The short film was titled 'The Thief' as part of the 'Relax. We Care.' campaign.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: When will the first Neue Klasse models enter production?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: The first Neue Klasse models will enter production at the end of 2025 at the Debrecen plant in Hungary.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: How many wins did Toprak Razgatlioglu achieve at Donington Park in 2025?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Toprak Razgatlioglu achieved a hat-trick (three wins) at Donington Park in 2025.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Where will the 2026 BMW Motorrad International GS Trophy take place?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: The 2026 BMW Motorrad International GS Trophy will take place in Romania.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Where does BMW manufacture high-voltage batteries for the Neue Klasse?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: BMW manufactures high-voltage batteries for the Neue Klasse at pilot plants in Parsdorf, Hallbergmoos, and Munich.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Who won the Hole-in-One car at the BMW Australian PGA Championship?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Daniel Gale won the BMW M5 Touring for a hole-in-one at the BMW Australian PGA Championship.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: How many EV charging sockets did BMW UK install in UK National Parks?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: BMW UK funded the installation of 135 new EV charging sockets across fifteen UK National Parks.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Which designer collaborated with MINI on the Paul Smith Edition?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Sir Paul Smith collaborated with MINI on the Paul Smith Edition.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Which artist created the 'Stasis' installation for ARTEPARCO?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Velasco Vitali created the 'Stasis' installation for ARTEPARCO.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What are the four 'Superbrains' in the Neue Klasse architecture?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: The four Superbrains handle infotainment, automated driving, driving dynamics, and basic functions like vehicle access and climate control.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: When did BMW NA send employees home due to COVID-19?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: BMW NA sent employees home on March 13, 2020, due to COVID-19.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Which MINI team finished second in the SP3T-class at the 24 Hours of Nürburgring?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: MINI John Cooper Works and Bulldog Racing finished second in the SP3T-class.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What was BMW's sales performance in China in Q3 2025?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: In China, retail sales did not meet expectations, with deliveries at previous year's level in Q3 2025.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Which BMW M Motorsport teams qualified for the Esports World Cup?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: BMW M Team Redline Racing Bulls, BS+COMPETITION, and MOUZ qualified for the Esports World Cup.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Who won the Italian GT Championship Sprint in previous seasons?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: BMW Italia Ceccato Racing and Jens Klingmann won the Italian GT Championship Sprint in the two previous seasons.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Where did BMW start series production of electric engines for the Neue Klasse?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: BMW started series production of electric engines for the Neue Klasse at Plant Steyr in Austria.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What was the total prize pool for the 2025 Esports World Cup?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: The total prize pool for the 2025 Esports World Cup was 500,000 US dollars.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: How many consecutive victories did Team WRT achieve at the Indianapolis Hour?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Team WRT celebrated its third consecutive victory at the Indianapolis Hour in 2025.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What is the power output of the BMW iX M70 xDrive?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: The BMW iX M70 xDrive delivers up to 485 kW/659 hp in My Mode Sport.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: Which BMW plant is the largest single BMW production facility in the world?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: BMW Group Plant Spartanburg in South Carolina is the largest single BMW production facility in the world.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: How many vehicles does Plant Spartanburg assemble daily?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Plant Spartanburg assembles more than 1,500 vehicles each day.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What was the BMW Group's profit before tax in 2023?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: The BMW Group's profit before tax in 2023 was €17.1 billion.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: How many employees did the BMW Group have as of December 2023?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: The BMW Group had a workforce of 154,950 employees as of December 31, 2023.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What is the expected CO₂e footprint reduction for the BMW iX3 compared to ICE vehicles?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: When charged with renewable electricity, the BMW iX3 beats comparable ICE models after only 17,500 kilometers.

bmw_qa_evaluation_set.question: What percentage of secondary materials are used in the new BMW iX3?
bmw_qa_evaluation_set.answer: Secondary materials account for one third of all material used in the new BMW iX3 50 xDrive.
